title: What are the different type of switches? - Quora

response.answer_text: There must be multiple, sharing the ones which i came across: Push to on switch (with lock / without lock)Slide switch - SPST (single pole single throw), DPDT (double pole double throw)Touch switchTurn to on switchRelay triggered switch (SPST & DPDT)
There are many of them. I will list some of them as follows: Push button switchOne Way switchTwo way/ three way switchMotor starter switchLED dimmer switch
